simpleExpressionProcessing 0.1.0

NCBIcountToMatrix

NCBIcountToMatrix.Rd

Takes raw RNA seq count file from NCBI and combines it with NCBI pipeline annotation file to generate a raw RNAseq count matrix

Usage

NCBIcountToMatrix(NCBI_count_path, NCBI_annotation_path)

Arguments

NCBI_count_path

String. Path to NCBI "Series RNA-seq raw counts matrix"

NCBI_annotation_path

String. Path to NCBI "Human gene annotation table"

Value

Matrix.

Details

Specifically depends on raw count matrix and annotation file used in NCBI standardized RNAseq processing pipeline

Examples

# \donttest{
  withr::with_tempdir({
    getRNAcountMatrixNCBI(GEO = "GSE158395")
    count_mtx <- NCBIcountToMatrix(
      NCBI_count_path = "GSE158395/GSE158395_raw_counts_GRCh38.p13_NCBI.tsv.gz",
      NCBI_annotation_path = "GSE158395/Human.GRCh38.p13.annot.tsv.gz"
    )
  })
  dim(count_mtx) # Should be 39374 x 13
#> [1] 39374    13
# }
